clean_content:
Definition / general

* Hereditary and intraosseous fibrous swellings of jaws* Autosomal dominant, bilateral involvement of mandible and maxilla in young individuals

Treatment

* Surgery may not be indicated

Microscopic (histologic) description

* Similar to central giant cell granuloma* Also more delicate fibrovascular stroma without bone formation

Microscopic (histologic) images

Contributed by Kelly Magliocca, D.D.S., M.P.H.  

[![Cherubism](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandiblemaxillawhoMagliocca39.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandiblemaxillawhoMagliocca39.jpg)

Cherubism
